content: Baw-Lang-Lang can be found at the start of the Bishui Cave but not technically in it. Once you've completed the five cart questline and smashed through the frozen door of the Bishui Cave, you'll want to head inside and down to the left to find another of the frog bosses.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 5', specifically from the subsection 'Baw-Lang-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Baw-Lang-Lang can be found at the start of the Bishui Cave but not technically in it. Once you've completed the five cart questline and smashed through the frozen door of the Bishui Cave, you'll want to head inside and down to the left to find another of the frog bosses.
